name: Task 3 Platformer - SGD102 by HGO002
description:
Platformer Game.  55 coins and 8 Gems to collect

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Space Bar - Jump

E - Interact

Controller Controls:

Left Analog Stick - Movement

Right Analog Stick - Look Around

A/X - Jump

X/Square - Interact
